description.raw:
When there is an existing pull request from a fork that has been deleted (for example pull request #1018), the `tools/bitbucket_pullrequests` tool will fail to list open pull requests with the following message:
~~~
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -s 1018
tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:25:in `initialize': undefined method `[]' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError)
	from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `new'
	from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `block in listPullRequests'
	from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `each'
	from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `listPullRequests'
	from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:176:in `<main>'
~~~
This pull request fixes its behavior and pads the missing fields with spaces to preserve alignment in the big list.
~~~
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -s 1018
 1018                    de20d7921de6    default
~~~
description.html:
When there is an existing pull request from a fork that has been deleted (for example pull request #1018), the tools/bitbucket_pullrequests tool will fail to list open pull requests with the following message:

$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -s 1018
tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:25:in `initialize': undefined method `[]' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError)
    from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `new'
    from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `block in listPullRequests'
    from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `each'
    from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:61:in `listPullRequests'
    from tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:176:in `<main>'

This pull request fixes its behavior and pads the missing fields with spaces to preserve alignment in the big list.

$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -s 1018
 1018                    de20d7921de6    default

title.raw: Fix bitbucket_pullrequests tool when a fork has been deleted
